Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/size

Function
  1. FProperty size(num s)
  2. FProperty size(computedNum cs)
  3. Fproperty size(num w, num h)
  4. Fproperty size(computedNum cw, computedNum ch)
Description Set the size of a figure:
  1. Set width and height to s. This is equivalent to width(s) and height(s).
  2. Same, but the width value is computed by the callback cs.
  3. Set width to w and height to h. This is equivalent to width(w) and height(h).
  4. Same, but the values for width and height are computed by the callbacks cw, respectively, ch.
